answers.answer: I understand its hard but don't give up! I have type 2  and I was so stressed at first but I have an awsome doctor and my insulin and eating better have kept my blood sugars controlled through my pregnancy!  My baby was my motivation. Trust me it will get better u just have to get full off of more healthier things and they key is watch ur carb intake and drink lots of water

I have to admit finding out i was pregnant while havimg type two diabetes hypertension and very high risk pregnancy i was stressed to the max but with the help of my dietician and high risk ob they havr helped me see the brighter sode of things thats its not only my life i have to worry about i have to also worry about my beautiful bundle of joy and its all worth it idk where i would be without having my baby in my belly it makes me feel so wonderful and proud....if anyone is struggling with the same situations please look on the brighter side of thing and that ur docs arent there to judge u they r there to help the both of u so u will hopefully make it close to being 40 weeks stay strong moms....our baby(s) need us!
Sorry if i messed up on some of it but u understand what i mean...i hope lol
Thanks everyone everyone I've just been having a hard time with it. I go is the diet lady Friday so I hope she can help more

Your welcome! You will be fine. They key is watching those bad carbs and not snacking on junk food!! Once u get ur sugars controlled it will be a breeze. I have had to keep mine controlled since 5 weeks when I found out. And trust me it wasn't easy but I never gave up

question: I'm so done ******* hungry but if I eat my blood sugars go to high if I don't they go to low. I can't do it no more. Tell my ob and diet person but they don't help. I'm really about ready to freak out on people
title: so done
